snippet: For Mariano Rivera, the longtime Yankees closer, the ailment is not expected to affect his recovery from knee surgery.
abstract: New York Yankees pitcher Mariano Rivera is treated for blood clot in his right calf; still plans to have knee surgery in the coming weeks, and remains confident that he will pitch again next year.
lead_paragraph: For Mariano Rivera, the longtime Yankees closer, the ailment is not expected to affect his recovery from knee surgery.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Mariano Rivera Battles Blood Clot in Calf
headline.main: Rivera Is Treated For Clot In Calf
headline.print_headline: Rivera Is Treated For Clot In Calf
